item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Sof command help. UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You can save your spins by adding them into your PlayerSave class. For it saying you won a rare item, just use the same method you have to give you the items. But only use the items you want it to say it’s a rare item with.

Read full topic

item.title: Sof command help. UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

i made a command “SOF” that runs the void startSpin();
2 problems.
one when ever i exit the game the spins go to [(ZERO)] how to save my spins.?
and i maked a loop in the startSpin method that check in the array SOFRewards my prizes
i want the loop will check if i [size=12pt]WON[/size] because the loop tell me if i have a “1038 item” in my array look:
for(int item : SOFRewards){
if(item == 1038){
sM(“You won a rare!!”);
}
}
but its only check if i have 1038 in my array i want it to check if i won the item 1038.
Ty.
Edit : i tryed to make this :
PlayerSave ps = new PlayerSave();
but im getting an error (LOL HOW?)

Read full topic
